* ruby 2.2.5 added
* add_source rake task reworked to extract patchlevel from sources

## 0.1.0

* Initial release - gem renamed to debase-ruby_source_code, Debugger module renamed to Debase
* sources for 2.1.3 and 2.2.0-preview1 added
